articles.content:

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccination: What are we actually waiting for? - Deutsche Welle
articles.description: Fast, faster, fastest: Developing an effective SARS-CoV-2 vaccine in record time — is it possible? And will it be the full answer to the pandemic? DW asked an expert a few basic questions about what we can expect.
